titles.title: Pollution Control Equipment Investment Act of 1994
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permit the issuance of tax-exempt bonds for air and water pollution control facilities.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 8/1/1994--Introduced. Pollution Control Equipment Investment Act of 1994 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit the issuance of tax-exempt bonds for air or water pollution control facilities.
